p: Moreover, Stankovic et al. showed that among the investigated extracts of T. chamaedrys, T. montanum, T. arduini, and T. scordium subsp. scordium all extracts significantly reduced cell viability in a dose-dependent manner with very low IC 50 values. The highest content of phenolic compounds and the best cytotoxic activity on HCT-116 cells after 24 h of exposure was in T. chamaedrys extract, with IC 50 values of 5.48 μg/ml after 72 h, while the methanolic extract of T. arduini appeared to have the best cytotoxic activity on HCT-116 with IC 50 values of 0.37 μg/ml [ 41].
